comment.author: 59375758@N06
comment._content: While Kajiado in Kenya is correct.   I believe that Ujiji on Lake Tanganyika (now Tanzania) is incorrect.   These sequence of photos seem to me to suggest the Magadi Soda Works on Lake Magadi.   Kajiado is nearby.   It will really needs a former Lake Magadi resident to confirm this.

comment.author: 102524903@N04
comment._content: I can. I lived in a village near Lake Magadi. This particular picture is likely in Kajiado town, because during the colonial period, it was typical for the managers of the Magadi Soda Company to live there, and not in Magadi itself because of the harsh climate there. (This is described in the book "Magadi: the Story of the Magadi Soda Company" by Mervyn Frederick Hill.)
